subject: Re: [junit] setActionForm in MockStrutsTestCase
msgSnippet: J, Someone here might be able to answer your question, but be sure to also check the StrutsTestCase user forums, where people are more likely to be familiar
messageBody:
J,

Someone here might be able to answer your question, but be sure to
also check the StrutsTestCase user forums, where people are more
likely to be familiar with this.

David Saff

On Fri, Aug 7, 2009 at 1:46 AM, yesjii<yesjii@...> wrote:
> Hi
> Ia m using MockStrutsTestCase for my junit testing for struts 1 actions.
> The problem i am facing is i am setting all the values in the form and then setting the form using setActionForm (form) and then using actionPerform(); When it reaches the action, the form is a new form and no value is mapped in the form.
> Please suggest what is wrong ? Also if i use addRequestParameter() instead of form, the value is available in the form.
>
> Thanks in advance
> J
>
